typedef long long int LL;
typedef long long               ll;
typedef unsigned int            uint;
typedef unsigned long long int     ull;
#define mem(a,b) memset(a,b,sizeof a)
using namespace std;
LL fact(int n)
{
    if(n<=1)
        return 1;
    else
        return(n*fact(n-1));
}
int main()
{
    int n,t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        int i=2;
        LL sum=0;
        while(i<=n)
        {
            if(i%2==0)
            sum+=fact(n)/fact(i);
            else
                sum-=fact(n)/fact(i);
            i++;
        }
        printf("%lld\n",sum);
    }

    return 0;
}
